column1: '''Halethrim''' was the rarely seen [[Elvish]] rendering of '[[Folk of Haleth]]'
column2: a name referring to those [[Men]] of the [[Haladin]] who followed the Lady [[Haleth]] westward across [[Beleriand]].<ref>{{CH|17}}
column3: p. 247</ref> Their main dwelling-place was on [[Amon Obel]] in the midst of the [[Forest of Brethil]].<ref>{{CH|13}}
